reviews.review: Great professor, very engaging and clear in explaining concepts. Highly recommend for Math courses.
reviews.subject: Math

reviews.review: The lectures were interesting, but the grading was tough. You really need to stay on top of your assignments.
reviews.subject: Physics

reviews.review: The professor is knowledgeable, but the course was challenging. Make sure to attend office hours.
reviews.subject: Chemistry

reviews.review: Great sense of humor and makes history enjoyable. Exams are straightforward if you attend lectures.
reviews.subject: History

reviews.review: The professor is strict but fair. The class is fast-paced, so be prepared to work hard.
reviews.subject: Computer Science

reviews.review: Lectures were boring and difficult to follow. However, the professor is helpful during office hours.
reviews.subject: Biology

reviews.review: Amazing professor! Always available to help and really cares about students' success.
reviews.subject: English

reviews.review: The course material was interesting, but the professor was often late to class and seemed unorganized.
reviews.subject: Economics

reviews.review: The professor is passionate about the subject, but the workload is heavy. Be prepared for a lot of reading.
reviews.subject: Political Science

reviews.review: Not the best at explaining things in lectures, but the textbook is a lifesaver. Make sure to read it thoroughly.
reviews.subject: Philosophy

reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Classes are interactive and you really learn a lot. Would take another course with them.
reviews.subject: Sociology

reviews.review: The professor was helpful and made the material easy to understand. Tests were fair and based on lectures.
reviews.subject: Psychology
